name: Miner Defender
description:
THE GAME:

You controlling a turret on a fixed path around a big meteor. Miner ship(s) dig and extract the resources and your task is to defend them AND the meteor's resources.

You gain funding when a ship is successfully extracted resources and left the meteor. Should a ship or some resources are destroyed your funding is cut. If all ships or half of the resources are destroyed, your mission fails.

See the icons on top for information: Funding, Level, Number of ships, Number of resources, Reputation. You loose reputation if a mission fails. If you lost all your reputation, it's game over.

There is an upgrade tree to better your turret's shield system, cannon, speed and shockwave.

KEYS TO PLAY

Keyboard AND mouse:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move around in a fixed circle/path

Press mouse left button to shoot

Press mouse right button to use shield

Press mouse middle button to release a shockwave

ESC for menu, P, or pause to pause game

Gamepad:

Use left stick or Dpad buttons to move around in a fixed circle/path

Use right stick to move pointer/crosshair

Press A or right trigger to shoot

Press X or right bumber to use shield

Press Y or left bumber to release shockwave

Select for menu
